trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.OriginalDataRestoredEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Represents a method that handles the <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject.OriginalDataRestored" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject.OriginalDataRestored" /> 事件的处理方法。

trans-unit.source: When you create an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.OriginalDataRestoredEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.OriginalDataRestoredEventHandler> 委托时，需要标识将要处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, until you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 每当发生该事件时，直到移除了该委托，都会调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> and a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject>, and binds the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject> to the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:System.Data.DataTable>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject>，并将绑定<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject>到<xref:System.Data.DataTable>。

trans-unit.source: It then creates an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject.OriginalDataRestored> event handler.
To test the event, right-click a column letter above the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject> on sheet 1 and then click **Delete** in the shortcut menu.
trans-unit.target: 要测试此事件，请右键单击上方的列字母<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject>在工作表 1，然后单击**删除**的快捷菜单中。

trans-unit.source: The event handler replaces the column and column header data and displays a message indicating what kind of data was restored and the reason that the original data was restored.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序替换列和列标题数据，并显示一条指示什么类型的数据已还原消息和，还原原始数据的原因。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。
